affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 副词后缀, 通常放在形容词后, "...地"

word_mean_info__list.difference: 非正式用词，侧重在一类中唯一无可匹敌、无与伦比的特征。
语气较强，强调仅此一个，再无第二个。
普通用词，常可与sole换用，但侧重仅限于指定的人或物，而不需要更多。
着重专指某人或某物，而不是别的。
语气强于only，指仅有一个或一群，只考虑这一个或这一群。

word_group.brief_definition: 同类中最重要的事物, 唯一的选择

word_group.brief_definition: 太；极度；到令人遗憾的地步

bilingual.source: Then I will only ask you three.
He vowed only to wish for light.
I only like movies that are funny.

list.abstract: ONLY是丹麦著名的国际时装公司BESTSELLER拥有的众多著名品牌之一，该品牌于1995年在丹麦创立，销售网点已拓展到了全球46个国家。 ONLY在1996年来到中国，于2000年首次在店铺中引进“快时尚”的定义，以保证款式始终引领潮流，这一概念流行至今并使ONLY成为众多欧洲时尚的领跑者。 2021年3月，ONLY因抵制新疆棉花事件，引发广泛关注。
ONLY，英文单词。中文意思：adj.唯一的；仅有的；最好的，最适当的； adv.只，仅仅；结果却，不料； conj.但是，可是；要不是。 可作为副词，形容词，连词使用。 在书面英语中，only 通常直接置于被修饰词之前。但在口语中，由于可通过重读指示修饰对象，故其位置并不太重要。

yingyinNormal.en: It only works on mortals.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只对凡人有效。

yingyinNormal.en: He only thinks he's smarter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他只认为他更聪明。

yingyinNormal.en: And now? Now there's only one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在呢？只剩一个了。

yingyinNormal.en: But we've only had one job.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我们只做了一笔生意啊。

yingyinNormal.en: It would only make things worse.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那只会让事情更糟。

yingyinNormal.en: Who's caring about only himself?
yingyinNormal.zh: 到底是谁只会关心自己？

yingyinNormal.en: They're only taking one this year.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今年他们只录取一个。

yingyinNormal.en: And it wasn't the only one in there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只掉了一条，里面还有。

yingyinNormal.en: We knew him only as Victor Minns.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们只知道他叫维克多·明斯。

yingyinNormal.en: The only thing you really fight for is yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你只会为自己拚命。

yingyinNormal.en: Spock came from a planet governed only by logic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 史波克来自只讲逻辑的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: Howard doesn't. He's only an engineer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 霍华德用不到那个，他只不过是个工程师。

yingyinNormal.en: Leonard, you said I only had to ask questions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德，你说过我只负责提问的。

yingyinNormal.en: I thought that sort of thing only happened to me!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得这种事只会发生在我身上！

yingyinNormal.en: I thought that sort of thing only happened to me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我以为这种事只会发生在我身上！

yingyinNormal.en: This is the President speaking. We talk to Conway only.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是总统。我们只和康威说话。

yingyinNormal.en: And needless to say... I report only to you, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不用说... 我只向您汇报，先生。

yingyinNormal.en: The university is only allowed to submit one proposal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而我们大学只允许提交一份申请书。

yingyinNormal.en: Smackle only wants to win. You ladies have been played.
yingyinNormal.zh: 史麦科只想赢而已，你们两个丫头被耍了。

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't think you jumped anymore. Only on special occasions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我以为你不再穿越了。只在特殊情况下。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in no other situation, time, place, or condition except

examination_example.sentence: The country produces <highlight>only</highlight> about 60 per cent of the food it eats, down from almost three-quarters in the late 1980s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该国的粮食产量仅占其所食用粮食的60%左右，低于上世纪80年代末的近四分之三。

examination_example.sentence: Intuition's special powers are unleashed <highlight>only</highlight> in certain circumstances.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直觉的特殊力量只有在特定的情况下才会释放出来。

examination_example.sentence: With the content of papers secured for free, the publisher needs <highlight>only</highlight> find a market for its journal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于论文内容是免费获得的，出版商仅需要为其期刊找到一个市场。

sense_info_list.en: alone of its or their kind

examination_example.sentence: Competition law appears to be the <highlight>only</highlight> way to address these imbalances of power.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 竞争法似乎是解决这些权力失衡的唯一途径。

examination_example.sentence: But privacy is not the <highlight>only</highlight> angle in this case and not even the most important.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在这种情况下，隐私不是唯一的角度，甚至不是最重要的。

examination_example.sentence: Parkrun is not a race but a time trial: Your <highlight>only</highlight> competitor is the clock.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Parkrun不是赛跑，而是计时赛：你唯一的竞争对手是时钟。

examination_example.sentence: This may not <highlight>only</highlight> do damage to your relationship with your child but also affect your child's self-esteem.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这不仅会损害你和孩子的关系，还会影响孩子的自尊。

examination_example.sentence: It may involve not <highlight>only</highlight> his parents and his friends, as well as those of the young woman, but also a matchmaker.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可能不仅涉及他的父母和他的朋友，还有那个年轻女人的父母朋友，以及一个媒人。

examination_example.sentence: Then it presents that connection, even among two-year-olds, between girls as not <highlight>only</highlight> innocent but as evidence of innocence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，粉色不仅可以呈现出女孩们之间，甚至是两岁女孩之间的共性是纯真，而且粉色自身即是纯真的证明。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Only</highlight> recently have they come to see the vital part forests will have to play in storing carbon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到最近，他们才意识到森林在储存碳方面的重要作用。

examination_example.sentence: Vanity is a constant; people will <highlight>only</highlight> start shopping more sustainably when they can't afford not to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虚荣心是不变的；人们只有在负担不起（非可持续购物方式）时，才会开始用可持续性的方式购物。

examination_example.sentence: It was <highlight>only</highlight> after "toddler" became a common shoppers' term that it evolved into a broadly accepted developmental stage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到“幼童”这个词常常为顾客所用，它才逐渐变成被人们广泛接受的一个成长阶段。

sense_info_list.en: with the negative or unfortunate result that

examination_example.sentence: Electronic means of payment would soon "revolutionize the very concept of money itself," <highlight>only</highlight> to reverse itself several years later.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电子支付方式很快就“彻底改变了货币本身的概念”，不料几年后又发生了逆转。

examination_example.sentence: Your first instinct is to fall into dependency supported by a state <highlight>only</highlight> too ready to indulge your falsehood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的第一本能反应就是陷入对国家的依赖，我们的国家总是非常愿意纵容你的这种错误想法。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 副词后缀, 通常放在形容词后, "...地"

word_usage.usage:
only作副词放句首，表示“仅在…情况下（或地点等）”以及“(直到）…才；（只是）…才”时，要用部分倒装，情态动词，助动词，be动词等提前，实意动词位置不变
例：Only in this way can you learn English well.只有这样你才能学好英语。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“仅有地；只”，指只有这些、不超过，强调不多于。
意为“仅仅；只不过”，指就是这样、只是如此，强调单一性。
意为“仅仅；只不过”，指仅此而已，并非其他。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 唯一的; 独一无二的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in no other situation, time, place, or condition except

examination_example.sentence: The toxic substances that fear, anger, frustration, and stress produce not <highlight>only</highlight> kill guinea pigs but kill us off in a similar manner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 恐惧、愤怒、沮丧和压力产生的有毒物质不仅会杀死豚鼠，还会以类似的方式杀死我们。

examination_example.sentence: I realized not <highlight>only</highlight> could I not afford my dream school, I couldn't even afford the ones where I'd been accepted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我意识到我不仅负担不起我梦想中的学校，甚至连录取我的学校都负担不起。

examination_example.sentence: This is not <highlight>only</highlight> a problem in developing countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这不仅是发展中国家的问题。

examination_example.sentence: And, unlike nutrients that are found <highlight>only</highlight> in a few foods, protein is present in all foods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且，与仅在少数食物中发现的营养素不同，蛋白质存在于所有食物中。

examination_example.sentence: It is <highlight>only</highlight> polite for us to do the same when we visit them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们拜访他们时，这样做只是出于礼貌。

examination_example.sentence: I have enough trouble delivering bikes to shops <highlight>only</highlight> 40 miles away, never mind 5, 000 miles!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我把自行车送到40英里以外的商店已经够麻烦了，更不用说5000英里了！

sense_info_list.zh: 唯一的; 独一无二的

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>only</highlight> other guarantee on the bill is a Federal Reserve pledge of as a confirmation in the form of government securities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该法案上唯一的其他担保是美联储保证的证实，以政府证券的形式。

examination_example.sentence: But since an "<highlight>only</highlight>" tends to be a well-adjusted individual, she'll eventually learn to relate to any chosen spouse.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但由于“唯一”的人往往是一个适应能力很强的人，她最终会学会与任何选择的配偶相处。

examination_example.sentence: He thinks it the <highlight>only</highlight> way out of the current food crisis.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他认为这是解决当前粮食危机的唯一途径。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 副词后缀, 通常放在形容词后, "...地"

word_usage.usage:
only可修饰单数名词，也可修饰复数名词。前面常加定冠词the或形容词性物主代词。
示例：We were the only people there.
我们是唯一在场的人。

only如与另一个形容词或数词连用，要放在其他词之前。
示例：There are only a small number of tickets available.
只剩下少量的票了。

only表“只, 仅仅”，常用在名词短语前，尤其是以数量词或数字起始的短语，此时only起强调作用。
示例：Only five people turned up.
只来了五个人。

“only+不定式”表“不料，结果却”，指一种出乎意料或令人失望的结果。
示例：I arrived at the shop only to find that I'd left all my money at home.
我到商店，却发现我的钱全放在家里了。

only作副词，表“只有”，强调为唯一性时，如“only+状语”位于句首，后面的句子须用倒装语序。
示例：Only in this way can we solve the problem.
只有通过这种方式，我们才能解决问题。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Similarly, if you speak <highlight>only</highlight> Chinese, receiving a card in Swedish takes part of the fun away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同样地，如果你只会说中文，收到用瑞典语写的卡片就会失去一部分乐趣。

examination_example.sentence: During the training stage, each dog was shown <highlight>only</highlight> the upper half or the lower half of the person's face.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在训练阶段，每只狗只看到人的上半张脸或下半张脸。

examination_example.sentence: This will help you to decide whether you really need to read the whole book or <highlight>only</highlight> certain parts of it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这将帮助你决定你是否真的需要阅读整本书，还是只阅读其中的某些部分。

examination_example.sentence: Age isn't the <highlight>only</highlight> factor; I'd say it's also to do with the makeup of your household.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 年龄不是唯一的因素；我认为这也和你家庭的构成有关。

examination_example.sentence: If the <highlight>only</highlight> reading you ever do is the novel or magazine, the speed at which you read-probably does not matter very much.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你只阅读小说或杂志，那么你阅读的速度可能并不重要。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>only</highlight> thing I didn't like is the food, especially the sausages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我唯一不喜欢的就是这些食物，尤其是香肠。

examination_example.sentence: Now that our project is over, I realize that I have affected not <highlight>only</highlight> one life, but ten.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在我们的项目结束了，我意识到我影响的不仅仅是一个人，而是十个人。

examination_example.sentence: There, he not <highlight>only</highlight> did well as a student but also became a(n) accomplished public speaker.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那里，他作为一名学生不但表现出色，而且成为了一名出色的演说家。

examination_example.sentence: I have grown not <highlight>only</highlight> physically, but also mentally in the past few years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在过去的几年里，我不仅身体上成长了，而且精神上也成长了。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Only</highlight> if we discuss the consequences of our biophysical limits can we have the hope to reduce their "speed, severity and harm".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只有我们讨论生物物理极限的后果，我们才能有希望降低它们的“速度、严重性和危害”。

examination_example.sentence: Still, 55 percent of Australians have a landline phone at home and <highlight>only</highlight> just over a quarter (29%) rely <highlight>only</highlight> on their smartphones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，根据一项调查显示，55%的澳大利亚人家里有固定电话，只有超过四分之一（29%）的人只使用智能手机。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 副词后缀, 通常放在形容词后, "...地"

word_usage.usage:
only在句子中位置不同，句意着重点也不同。一般only应放在它所修饰的词前，或被修饰的成分位于句末，only可放在所修饰词的前或后，试比较：
Only he speaks Chinese at home.
只有他在家里说汉语。（而别人不说）
He only speaks Chinese at home. 
他只在家里说汉语。（而不读或不写）
He speaks Chinese only at home.
他只在家里说汉语。（而在别处不说）

only后跟不定式作结果状语，常指使人惊讶、失望、伤心的事：
We hurried to the station, only to find the train had already left.
我们急忙赶到车站，却发现火车已经开走了

only too、much too、all too后跟形容词或副词，为“太，很，非常”之意：
We are only too pleased to see the film.
我们非常乐意看那部电影。

only引导的状语位于句首时，句子应部分倒装：
Only in this way can we learn advanced technology from abroad.
只有这样我们才能从国外学到先进技术。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 唯一的; 独一无二的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in no other situation, time, place, or condition except

examination_example.sentence: It can produce electricity not <highlight>only</highlight> from solar energy but also from falling rain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它不仅可以通过太阳能发电，还可以通过降雨发电。

examination_example.sentence: Beijing's Palace Museum opened after dark for <highlight>only</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 北京故宫博物院只在天黑后开放。

examination_example.sentence: Her grandmother broke her legs and she could walk <highlight>only</highlight> with a stick.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她的祖母摔断了腿，她只能靠拐杖走路。

examination_example.sentence: Work on it for <highlight>only</highlight> five minutes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只做五分钟。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Only</highlight> 300 people will be allowed to climb it, and <highlight>only</highlight> during spring.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只有300人被允许攀登，而且只能在春天。

examination_example.sentence: There are <highlight>only</highlight> about 2, 000 pandas living in the forests now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在只有大约2000只熊猫生活在森林里。

sense_info_list.zh: 唯一的; 独一无二的

examination_example.sentence: For some, this was the <highlight>only</highlight> hot meal they would eat that week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对一些人来说，这是他们那一周吃的唯一一顿热饭。

examination_example.sentence: In Vanuatu, you'll find the world's <highlight>only</highlight> underwater post office in the capital, Port Villa.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在瓦努阿图的首都维拉港，你会发现世界上唯一的水下邮局。

examination_example.sentence: Shanghai is not the <highlight>only</highlight> city trying to save the old phone booths.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上海并不是唯一一个试图挽救旧电话亭的城市。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 副词后缀, 通常放在形容词后, "...地"

word_usage.usage:
only可修饰单数名词，也可修饰复数名词。前面常加定冠词the或形容词性物主代词。
示例：We were the only people there.
我们是唯一在场的人。

only如与另一个形容词或数词连用，要放在其他词之前。
示例：There are only a small number of tickets available.
只剩下少量的票了。

only表“只, 仅仅”，常用在名词短语前，尤其是以数量词或数字起始的短语，此时only起强调作用。
示例：Only five people turned up.
只来了五个人。

“only+不定式”表“不料，结果却”，指一种出乎意料或令人失望的结果。
示例：I arrived at the shop only to find that I'd left all my money at home.
我到商店，却发现我的钱全放在家里了。

only作副词，表“只有”，强调为唯一性时，如“only+状语”位于句首，后面的句子须用倒装语序。
示例：Only in this way can we solve the problem.
只有通过这种方式，我们才能解决问题。
